title: LF DUO partner to climb out of Bronze (must be mature age)
body:
IGN: Skunken

I am 28 years old, been playing league for roughly 6 months now, I main Jungle and Supp currently but enjoy playing everywhere.

I have been up and down in solo queue rank, got to silver 4, back to bronze 5, it's a curse. I want to get out of bronze so I can play with more experienced players so I too can gain experience and useful skills rather than "how to deal with toxic behaviour 101".

I'm not into the whole full serious practising vs bots and communicating via skype stuff, I mean that could possibly come down the track but right now I just want to have someone who will duo with me and hopefully get better together, and gtfo of Bronze.

As the title says, I don't want to be playing with a duo partner who is 12 years old, just someone keen to climb the ranks with me by getting to know each others game style and learn whats good and whats bad and what's going to help us win games and especially no toxic behaviour or someone with rage issues.

Cheers fellas

replies.body: You willing to run a few normals so i can gauge skill level?
Move to Korea, OCE is an Ocean filled with immature trolls.
Said the guy that want to go pro and got bronze again this season.

IGN: Grump Smurf

32y/o and i play daily
 if im duo with someone i like to Skype with them just for the communication in game. 
Started in S3 after promo and been bouncing between S5 and S3. Main ADC/MID.
 Add me

Last season was mostly Silver. Until my trip to Berlin... and I overstayed!
Demotion!
I'm 32. Feel free to Add Me. :)
And there is a chat group called...

#OldPeopleHere

Come join it, and maybe youll find someone.

*Note I wrote the freaking channel name wrong. No Spaces. Its rectified now. Soz!

> [{quoted}](name=BaconPoroDeluxe,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=lozFdhxY,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-10T21:50:38.199+0000)
>
> Last season was mostly Silver. Until my trip to Berlin... and I overstayed!
> Demotion!
> I'm 32. Feel free to Add Me. :)
> And there is a chat group called...
> 
> #Old People Here
> 
> Come join it, and maybe youll find someone.

Looking you and this chat channel up as soon as I get online!

please do! we have dwindling numbers. Traffic is usually busy on weekends, and maybe after work hours, otherwise its dead. i usually try to never log out, but sometimes computer resets are needed.
would play for sure.

I'm old and frustrated just like you. Born in 85 so a little bit older. Cbf with voice comms, Im sure my young wife doesn't want to hear our geek speak anyway but if it came to full time competitive gaming that would be a different story. I have played LOL on and off casually for about 3 years, recently spending a lot more time playing than in earlier years. I have a very small friends list. Not many players to add really. I'm not concerned with your skill level, I feel a duo team grows together with experience and learning your partners play style. I'd love to have a game sometime, good, bad or ugly, it's nice to have other enthusiast mature gamers to match with. 

I will attempt to add anyone serious about mature game play from this thread, hopefully we can link up a group on oceania, I'm sure there is one around I just haven't found it yet. Going to check out the OLD PEOPLE HERE chat. I can see there a few less than constructive comments on your message. Just ignore and move on.

I was Silver 2 now Bronze 4 and falling. I'm not a bad player, the solo q is a hard life with a lot of not so great and hormonal kids playing.

**Please add me Robsy - I play daily (ONCE THIS PATCH UNSPECIFIED ERROR IS RECTIFIED)**
I'm old. Add me for normal I'll see what you got. But skype / curse makes a big difference. A coordinated team of average players will beat a team of good laners with no team play.

I'll help. I'm 17 but i sound more mature then that. I'm stuck in Bronze much like you and I'm eager to get out of it.
I main Annie/Udyr. If one is banned i usually go with the other. If both are banned i usually go with ADC Aatrox.

> [{quoted}](name=MoodswingModz,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=lozFdhxY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-10T17:27:07.971+0000)
>
> I'll help. I'm 17 but i sound more mature then that. I'm stuck in Bronze much like you and I'm eager to get out of it.
> I main Annie/Udyr. If one is banned i usually go with the other. If both are banned i usually go with ADC Aatrox.

^ Recommend you don't duo with this one... based on champion pool of 3.
I can fill just about any role. Those were just my mains i'm best at.

"LF DUO partner to climb out of Bronze"
"I'm not into the whole full serious practising vs bots and communicating via skype stuff"

You want to get out of bronze, but you don't want to practice or use skype to communicate effectively. Maybe ranked isn't for you, why not play normals and just enjoy the game?
